title: Front Direction Indicators - Removal

body.body: Make sure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported.
A correctly supported motorcycle will help prevent it from falling.
An unstable motorcycle may fall, causing injury to the operator or damage to the motorcycle.
Battery Disconnect DV; DVX; DVY; DW; DW4; DX4; DWB; DVB

metadata.ModelsTaxonomyLink: DWB; DVB; DVY; DX4; DW4; DW; DVX; DV

body.body: Fuel Tank Removal DV; DVX; DVY; DW; DW4; DX4; DWB; DVB

metadata.ModelsTaxonomyLink: DVB; DWB; DX4; DW4; DVY; DW; DVX; DV

body.body: Note the routing of the front direction indicator harness for installation.
Release and discard the fixings and remove the cable guide.
Note the routing of the direction indicator harnesses for installation.
The right hand direction indicator harness can be identified by the red tape on it.
Disconnect the direction electrical connectors from the main harness within the headstock.
Route the direction indicator harnesses to the direction indicators, removing the rubber band securing them to the clutch cable, and noting their routing for installation.
Loosen the fixing securing the front direction indicator to the fork.
As the fork is released, slide the direction indicator clamp off the fork and remove. Discard the fixing.
